thread.title: Ground News - The most sought-after dish for the New Year's table. It can reach up to 120 lei
thread.title_full: Ground News - The most sought-after dish for the New Year's table. It can reach up to 120 lei

author: Stirile Antena 1 Observator
title: Ground News - The most sought-after dish for the New Year's table. It can reach up to 120 lei
text:
Summary by Stirile Antena 1 Observator The New Year's menu is not complete without fish ! Romanians say that it should not be missing from the menu, if we want to have a trouble-free new year. This is what tradition says, so people strive to respect it as a la carte. The most happy are the merchants, because the number of customers ends up doubling. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Stirile Antena 1 Observator The most sought-after dish for the New Year's table. It can reach up to 120 lei The New Year's menu is not complete without fish! Romanians say that it should not be missing from the menu, if we want to have a trouble-free new year. This is what tradition says, so people strive to respect it as a la carte. The most happy are the merchants, because the number of customers ends up doubling.

Romanians say that it should not be missing from the menu, if we want to have a trouble-free new year. This is what tradition says, so people strive to respect it as a la carte. The most happy are the merchants, because the number of customers ends up doubling.
9 hours ago · Romania Read Full Article antena3.ro The most sought-after dish for New Year's Eve | Romanians take out of their pockets even 120 lei According to Romanian tradition or others taken from neighboring countries, certain foods consumed on the night between years bring good luck, happiness and abundance.
